content:
Hi!
I'm looking at tracking issue https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/44434 for adding accessors to Command, and it seems that it's been implemented for a while and there appear to be no barriers to stabilizing it that I'm aware of, from an API perspective at least.

Is there any significant issue I'm missing, and if not, can someone kick off an fcp for stabilization? Thanks!
Hm, I recall us recently discussing something similar for getters/accessors for thread builders, and i vaguely recall we didn't want to add those.
ah no, that was making it reusable, not adding getters.
